General.Name: Shenzhen MTC Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen MTC Co., Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells LCD TVs, set-top boxes, LED products, network devices, internet entertainment, and other related products and services. It offers its products under the FunTV and MTC Lighting brands. Shenzhen MTC Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
